text: The Hanteng X8 is a mid-size crossover utility vehicle made by Hanteng Autos from 2019 to 2021. == History and Features == The Hanteng X8 was shown at the Shanghai Auto Show in 2019 its the largest Crossover SUV made by Hanteng and heavily based in the Hanteng X7 plataform but slightly small it has a 2.0 liter turbo gasoline engine that is the same engine from the Hanteng X7 with a 6-speed DCT transmission. == Markets == The Hanteng X8 was sold mainly in the Chinese Market during its production. == Discontinuation == The production of the Hanteng X8 ended in 2021 and the car was discontinued without sucessor. == References == Category:Chinese automobiles
title: Hanteng X8
